plants.name: Monstera Deliciosa
plants.description: A popular tropical houseplant with unique split leaves. Thrives in bright, indirect light.
plants.care: Water when top 2 inches of soil are dry. Mist frequently.

plants.name: Snake Plant
plants.description: Extremely resilient and low-maintenance, perfect for beginners. Purifies the air effectively.
plants.care: Water sparingly, about once every 2-4 weeks. Tolerates low light.

plants.name: Fiddle Leaf Fig
plants.description: A stylish and striking plant known for its large, violin-shaped leaves.
plants.care: Prefers bright, filtered light. Water when the top inch of soil is dry.

seeds.name: Sunflower Seeds
seeds.description: Packet of vibrant sunflower seeds that grow into tall, beautiful flowers.
seeds.care: Sow in full sun after the last frost. Water regularly.

seeds.name: Tomato Seeds
seeds.description: High-yield heirloom tomato seeds for a bountiful harvest. Sweet and juicy.
seeds.care: Start indoors 6-8 weeks before the last frost. Needs full sun.

seeds.name: Basil Seeds
seeds.description: Sweet basil seeds perfect for culinary use. Grows well in pots or gardens.
seeds.care: Sow in a sunny location. Keep soil consistently moist.
